dmca.title: US Registered Trademark Infringement
dmca.body:
Dear Sir or Madam, 

It has come to my attention that a domain -  er9c9n.info  - that is hosted by The Planet on the IP - 74.52.79.250 -  contains elements that are direct infringements of  our US Registered Trademark. 

Namely the text 

"Free dangerdave porn" and "Freae dangerdave porn"  and "Frue dangerdave porn"


I am the registered proprietor in the United States of the trademark: Dangerdave. (Serial Number 75637813)

As you are aware, I have for many years provided legal adult material on the internet. As a result of my activities, the Dangerdave trademark has become extremely well known in the adult website space.


Your customer
